meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Samantha Nataro Nolan Martch Stuart Anderson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6690.

td.p: Samantha Nataro, a student and writer from Laurel, Maryland
Nolan Martch, a construction foreman from Homewood, Illinois
Stuart Anderson, a JAG originally from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 3-day cash winnings total $51,601)

tr.td: (Alex: In honor of our 30th year on the air...)
HERE COMES 30!
A NOVEL HAIKU
FASHIONABLE COMMON BONDS
M IN THE MIDDLE
(Alex: You'll find [*] in the exact middle of each correct response.)
AMERICAN IDOL ALUMNI
AROUND THE WORLD WITH MAGELLAN'S CREW

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'April, June, November & September

Nolan
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The 4 months of exactly 30 days each; remember the rhyme!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The 4 months of exactly 30 days each; remember the rhyme!

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'It\'s Ralph Ellison /
Don\'t add "The" to the title /
Nameless narrator')

Don't add "The" to the title /

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows a map on the monitor.) Magellan left Spain on September 20, 1519; just 1 week later, he received a letter telling him of a mutinous plot while getting provisions in these islands

Nolan
Samantha

GEMS

KEEP YOUR FRIENDS CLOSE

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
